function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of infrastructure to support 5G networks","Impact":"Difficulty in wide-scale deployment of 5G networks","Mitigation":"Investing in infrastructure development and maintenance","Technologies":"Internet of Things (IoT), Artificial Intelligence (AI), cloud computing","People":"Governments, telecom operators","Owner":"Governments, telecom operators"},{"Description":"Ineffective use of 5G networks in healthcare without other technologies","Impact":"Limited revolutionizing of the healthcare sector","Mitigation":"Integration with IoT, AI, and cloud computing","Technologies":"Internet of Things (IoT), Artificial Intelligence (AI), cloud computing","People":"Healthcare centers, medical personnel","Owner":"Healthcare centers, medical personnel"},{"Description":"Lack of established guidelines for patient data confidentiality in 5G healthcare systems","Impact":"Risk of patient data breaches and security issues","Mitigation":"Establishing comprehensive data security guidelines","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data transmission technologies","People":"Healthcare centers, medical personnel","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, healthcare centers"}]}
